event.title: Talk about "Free Software in education – A glance at Europe" at FSCONS in Gothenburg, Sweden
event.body: Guido Arnold, FSFE's edu-team coordinator, will give a talk about "Free Software in education – A glance at Europe" at FSCONS in Gothenburg, Sweden. The talk will discuss a few examples how Free Software is being used in Europe, how its use is politically backed, why the decision was made to migrate and which challenges were encountered.
